body_html:
I can't immediately tell why, looking at the code. Call stack: Saver.save() calls _MaybeDeleteOldCheckpoints(), which will inspect max_to_keep.

Could you add some debug logging to both these methods, and relaunch on the two machines?

Could you add some debug logging to both these methods, and relaunch on the two machines?
body:
I can't immediately tell why, looking at the code.  Call stack: `Saver.save()` calls `_MaybeDeleteOldCheckpoints()`, which will inspect `max_to_keep`.  

Could you add some debug logging to both these methods, and relaunch on the two machines?
